name: Quilpie to Birdsville - Necktie
description:
Taken from the helicopter, this road is 600km long and takes 11 hours to drive from Quilpie to Birdsville in central Australia. Tie on some Outback Australia. Created by award winning photographer, helicopter pilot and fashion designer Robyn Hills, iconic photos are printed onto fabric and hand-tailored into 'wearable art'. Give a stylish gift that will be talked about – reminding them of you each time it's worn. These unique pieces are conversation starters. Gift boxed for a lovely presentation, each comes with the story and a miniature of the original photo that inspired the design. The beautiful wooden box has a sliding drawer – creating delighted suspense when opening your gift. The wearer will be delighted at how often they get complimented on their tie or scarf – retelling the story of you giving it to them. • Dry cleaning is recommended but can be carefully hand washed in warm water and gentle soap. • Made by hand in Australia • Designed in Australia by Robyn Hills • Length 153cm / 60" • Width 7cm / 3" Fabric is duchess satin chosen for it's luxe feel and beautiful draping. It is also selected for it's ability for reproduction quality of the photographs with depth and tonal range detail that no other fabric can produce to create your wearable work of art.

name: Red Contours - Pocket Square / Kerchief
description:
The red soil farm land of Australia being prepared for planting - photographs with striking brilliance. Animal tracks criss-cross the fresh cultivation. For a very dapper look, add a pocket square to your suit jacket. The designs can be folded in several different ways to bring out the different colours to compliment a variety of shirt and suit colours. In the finest silk with hand-rolled edges, they are sure to impress. Wearing a kerchief adds colour and pizzaz to your look. In summer, you may not want to wear a buttoned-up shirt, but still want a splash of colour. In the softest silk, you won't even notice you're wearing it – but everyone else will. • Dry cleaning is recommended • Made in China • Designed in Australia by Robyn Hills • Size 40x40cm / 16x16"
